chunk:
Healing-Scents Forever Young Face Cream (2019 formulation)

Brand: Healing-Scents

Category: Anti Aging

Ingredients: water, vegetable glycerin, sunflower oil, macadamia oil, calendula infused oil, kukui oil, avocado oil, beeswax, potassium sorbate, zinc oxide, rice powder, xanthan gum, lavender essential oil, carrot seed essential oil, rosemary es

ial oil, rosemary essential oil, rose otto essential oil, hydraluronic acid, rosemary oil extract, natural vitamin e oil.

Directions: Do not use too much! Apply lightly. Gently smooth on face, eye, neck and chest (if wrinkled) areas. This is a perfect "eye cream", safe for eye lids. If you have problem areas, apply blemish stick or acne gel on tho

k or acne gel on those areas. Let Forever Young Face Cream "set" about 15 minutes before applying mineral makeup.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
